data.sentence: The word إِسْرَاءِيلَ comes from the root ا س ر and is associated with the meanings: to make captive, prisoner, joint/ligament/frame/vigour/energy.
The word بَنِي comes from the root ب ن و and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: to inherit, be heir to anyone, survive, be owner or sustainer of somebody after some one, succeed.
data.sentence: The word وَأَوْرَثْنَاهَا comes from the root و ر ث and is associated with the meanings: to inherit, be heir to anyone, survive, be owner or sustainer of somebody after some one, succeed.
